channel.title: Tiago Queiroz
channel.copyright: all articles under Creative Commons BY-SA

item.title: Talks
item.description: Advanced testing techniques: Tips and tricks for testing I gave this talk twice: 11 December 2019 at Onefootball as part of the GDG Berlin Golang. 21 January 2020 at Cosmos as part of the GoDays 2020 Pre-Conference Meetup All slides and code examples are on my GitHub: belimawr/advanced-testing Graceful Degradation and Timeouts I gave this talk at the Berlin Golang Meetup on 07/08/2018, all slides and code can be found on my GitHub: belimawr/graceful-degradation

item.title: Advanced Testing in Golang part 1: Mocks
item.description: This post was originally posted in OneFootball’s Tech Blog, please read it on Medium
